name: Logan's Game
description:
Hello, yes, this is Logan's Game.

It takes place both in the physical and virtual world.

To play this game you must first find/make/manipulate/pay-off at least 3 other people (friends are ideal) to join.

You will also need materials for creating masks.  Just about anything works!  

Further instructions for playing are included in the beginning act.

For an example of such a play-through, visit https://www.logankruidenier.com/logans-game.html

****** IF THE GAME IS LAGGING OR SOME GRAPHICS ARE NOT SHOWING UP: reboot the game and change the graphics settings to “high” and if it is still problematic, then reboot again and change the window size setting to something that is not full - screen. ********

---------------------------------Credits ------------------------------------

All music is composed, recorded and produced by me, with the exception of the forest zone's music, which is Ryuichi Sakamoto's album "Illustrated Musical Encyclopedia."

Sit-up sound: Appropriated from Mario Kart Double Dash.

3D Trees and Terrain: Unity Asset Pack.

Also using Doodle Studio 95! By Fernando Ramallo.

...Everything else was created / designed by me in Unity : > )

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
